text: John David Crow (July 8, 1935 â€“ June 17, 2015) was an American football player, coach, and college athletics administrator. He won the Heisman Trophy as a halfback at Texas A&M; University in 1957. He and later played professional football in the National Football League (NFL) for the Chicago / St. Louis Cardinals and the San Francisco 49ers between 1958 and 1968. Brent Zwerneman, " Texas A&M; Heisman Trophy winner John David Crow dies at 79 ," Houston Chronicle (June 18, 2015).
